sn20.5:1.4: ‘aham imam sattim tinhaphalam panina va mutthina va patilenissami patikottissami pativattessami’ti.
sn20.5:1.6: bhabbo nu kho so puriso amum sattim tinhaphalam panina va mutthina va patilenetum patikottetum pativattetun”ti?
sn20.5:1.9: “Asu hi, bhante, satti tinhaphala na sukara panina va mutthina va patilenetum patikottetum pativattetum.
sn20.5:1.10: Yavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
sn20.5:2.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettacetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, tassa ce amanusso cittam khipitabbam manneyya;
sn20.5:2.2: atha kho sveva amanusso kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa.
sn20.5:2.4: ‘metta no cetovimutti bhavita bhavissati bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha’ti.
